sheep.collision
Class CollisionLayer

java.lang.Object
  sheep.game.Layer
      sheep.collision.CollisionLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpriteContainer
public class CollisionLayer
extends Layer
implements SpriteContainer

A layer which contains Sprites and generates collisions between them, but without the overhead a spatial partitioning.
